summary: Email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding a formal preservation request for video surveillance footage from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, specifically for cell Z06-215 from July 22, 2019, 11 pm to July 23, 2019, 4 am, in relation to the Jeffrey Epstein incident. The request is made by attorney Aida Leisenring to a supervisory staff attorney and a special investigative technician.

persons.name: Aida Leisenring
persons.context: Attorney from Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco LLP who sends the initial preservation request for video footage related to the Epstein incident at MCC.

connections.description: Leisenring sends a formal preservation request to M regarding video footage of the Epstein incident at MCC.

events.title: Epstein Incident at MCC
events.description: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred in the early morning hours at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, leading to an investigation and preservation requests for video surveillance.

events.title: Video Footage Preservation Request
events.description: Formal request to preserve video surveillance footage from the SHU tier containing cell Z06-215 from 11 pm July 22, 2019, to 4 am July 23, 2019, for investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
Barket, Epstein, Kearon, Aldea & LoTurco LLP, 666 Old Country Road, Ste 700, Garden City, NY 11530
SHU tier cell Z06-215, MCC New York
keyFacts: A formal preservation request was made on July 25, 2019, for video footage from the SHU at MCC New York covering July 22, 2019, 11 pm to July 23, 2019, 4 am, related to the Epstein incident.
The request specifically targets cell Z06-215 and includes potential body camera footage from responding officers.
Attorney Aida Leisenring represents the legal interest in preserving evidence for investigation and potential court proceedings.
The incident under investigation occurred in the early morning hours of July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing investigation into the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein at the time.
